fn.p: This paper is an extended version of our paper published in Lvova, L.; Di Natale, C.; Paolesse, R. Electronic Tongue Based on Porphyrins for Apulian Red Wines Defects Detection. In Proceedings of the ISOCS/IEEE International Symposium on Olfaction and Electronic Nose (ISOEN), Montreal, QC, Canada, 28–31 May 2017; and Lvova, L.; Di Natale, C.; Paolesse, R. E-tongue based on Porphyrin Electropolymers for Apulian Red Wines Defects Detection. Proceedings 2017, 1, 489, doi:10.3390/proceedings1040489.
